data.title: phazap: Low-latency identification of strongly lensed signals
data.name: phazap
data.description: Gravitational wave phase reconstruction for low-latency identification of strongly lensed signals

evidence: README install command: "$ pip install phazap"
"Phazap is a package to efficiently post-process gravitational-wave (GW) parameter estimation data to obtain the phases and polarization state of the signal at a given detector and frequency."
"This code is used for low-latency identification of strongly lensed gravitational waves via their phase consistency by measuring their distance in the detector phase space."
